rit.eyeTrackingAPI.ApplicationUtilities
Class EyeTrackingMediator

java.lang.Object
  rit.eyeTrackingAPI.ApplicationUtilities.EyeTrackingMediator

public abstract class EyeTrackingMediator
extends java.lang.Object

A graphics rendering thread class. Handles performing operations based on data coming from the eye tracker.

Author:
cde7825

Nested Class Summary
 class EyeTrackingMediator.RenderingLoop
          A Runnable object that will loop until told to stop, calling its display method when a new coordinate is available and paint fixations if the "paintingFixations" field is set to true.

stop

public void stop()
Request a stop for the animation thread. Essentially sets a flag so that the next time through its animation loop, it exits the loop and stops on its own.
